info.modal.mobile.commerce.description.s: A message has been sent to the indicated phone number. To confirm the payment, follow the steps indicated in the SMS from the operator. You can close this window.
Usually payment takes several minutes, in rare cases, the process may take up to 3 days. Once the payment has passed, you will receive a message from the operator.

form.interaction.redirect.text: You should follow the payment form instruction

InvalidPaymentTool.text: Payment failed: invalid payment data entered.
steps: Go back.
Make sure you have entered valid card or account number.
Press “Pay” again.
If error persists try using another card or account.

AccountLimitsExceeded.text: Payment failed: limits set by you exceeded.
steps: Login into your internet bank or account.
Check and modify your payment or country limits.
Return to checkout and press “Try again”.
If error persists contact your bank or payment institution.
Check your card or account balance.
Top up your account.
Return to checkout and press “Try again”.
If error persists try using another card or account.

PreauthorizationFailed.text: Payment failed: can’t verify confirmation code.
steps: Press “Try again”.
Check if you are entering correct payment password or SMS authentication code.
Check if you don’t cancel payment on your payment institution confirmation page.
If error persists contact your bank or payment institution.

RejectedByIssuer.text: Payment failed: your payment institution has rejected your payment.
steps: Check your payment and country limits in your payment institution account.
Check if your card or account is enabled for internet payments.
Contact your bank or payment institution.
Try using another card or account.

PaymentRejected.text: Payment failed: your payment has been rejected.
steps: Try using another card or account.
Contact support.
